Name: Boomerang
Desc: Critical hits have a 50% chance to return the bullet to the magazine. If a bullet is returned to the magazine, the next shot has 40% increased damage.

Name: Breadbasket
Desc: Landing body shots adds a stack of bonus 35% headshot damage to the next headshot for 10 seconds. Max stack is 3.

Name: Close & Personal
Desc: Killing a target within 7 meters grants 30% weapon damage for 10 seconds

Name: Eyeless
Desc: Deal 20% weapon damage to blinded enemies. After 4 kills, applies blind to the next enemy you hit.

Name: Fast Hands
Desc: Critical hits add a stack of 4% reload speed bonus. Max stack is 40.

Name: Finisher
Desc: Swapping from this weapon within 10 seconds of killing an enemy grants 30% critical hit chance and 30% critical hit damage for 15 seconds.

Name: First Blood
Desc: If scoped, your first shot fired from out of combat or after fully reloading from empty deals headshot damage to any part of the body hit. Requires a Scope with 8x magnification or higher.

Name: Frenzy
Desc: For every 10 bullets in the magazine capacity, gain 3% rate of fire and 3% weapon damage for 5 seconds when reloading from empty.

Name: Ignited
Desc: Deal 20% weapon damage to burning enemies. After 4 kills, applies burning to the next enemy you hit.

Name: Killer
Desc: Killing an enemy with a critical hit grants 40% critical hit damage for 10 seconds.

Name: Lucky Shot
Desc: Magazine capacity is increased by 20%. Missed shots from cover have a 100% chance to return to the magazine.

Name: Measured
Desc: The top half of the magazine has +20% rate of fire and -30% weapon damage. The bottom half of the magazine has -20% rate of fire and +30% weapon damage.

Name: Naked
Desc: Hitting an enemy with no armor grants 50% headshot damage for 5 seconds.

Name: Near Sighted
Desc: Receive 80% stability at the cost of 35% optimal range.

Name: On Empty
Desc: Reloading from empty grants 30% weapon handling for 10 seconds.

Name: Optimist
Desc: Weapon damage is increased by 3% for every 10% ammo missing from the magazine.

Name: Outsider
Desc: After killing an enemy, gain 100% optimal range and 100% accuracy for 10 seconds.

Name: Overflowing
Desc: Every 3 reloads from empty increases your base magazine capacity by 100%.

Name: Overwhelm
Desc: Suppressing an enemy, that is not currently suppressed, grants 10% weapon damage for 12 seconds. Max stack is 4.

Name: Perpetuation
Desc: Headshots grant 50% status effect damage and duration to the next status effect you apply. Cooldown is 20 seconds.

Name: Preservation
Desc: Killing an enemy repairs 10% armor over 5 seconds. Headshot kills improves the repair to 10%.

Name: Pummel
Desc: 3 consecutive kills refill the magainze and grant 40% weapon damage for 10 seconds.

Name: Pumped Up
Desc: Reloading grants 1% weapon damage for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 25.

Name: Ranger
Desc: Amplifies weapon damage by 2% for every 5 meters you are away from your target.

Name: Reformation
Desc: Headshots grant 30% skill repair for 8 seconds.

Name: Rifleman
Desc: Landing headshots adds a stack of bonus 10% weapon damage for 5 seconds. Max stack is 5. Additional headshots refresh the duration.

Name: Sadist
Desc: Deal 20% weapon damage to bleeding enemies. After 4 kills, applies bleed to next enemy you hit.

Name: Salvage
Desc: Killing a target has a 70% chance to refill the magazine.

Name: Spike
Desc: Headshots grant 20% skill damage for 8 seconds.

Name: Steady Handed
Desc: Hits grant a stack of 1% accuracy and stability. At 100 stacks, consumes them to refill the magazine.

Name: Strained
Desc: Gain 10% critical hit damage for every 0.5 seconds you are firing. Stacks up to 5 times.

Name: Unhinged
Desc: Receive 18% weapon damage at the cost of 25% stability and 25% accuracy.

Name: Unwavering
Desc: Swapping to this weapon grants 300% weapon handling for 5 seconds. Kills refresh the buff. Swapping away disables this from all weapons for 5 seconds.

Name: Vindictive
Desc: Killing an enemy with a status effect applied grants all group members within 15 meters, 15% critical hit chance and 15% critical hit damage for 20 seconds.

Name: Electromagnetic Accelerator
Desc: Shots fired deal 0 -100% weapon damage based on how long the trigger is held before releasing.

Name: Big Game Hunter
Desc: When scoped, switches to semi-automatic fire mode, dealing 450% weapon damage with each shot.

Name: Eagle's Strike
Desc: +Accuracy as you fire, up to 30%. Headshot kills grant Tenacity for 15s increasing 1% for body shots, 5% for headshots.

Name: Tenacity
Desc: 40%-80% of damage taken is delayed until buff expires. Delayed damage is reduced 33% per kill while buff is active.

Name: Adaptive Instincts
Desc: 30 headshots: 20% CHC, 50% CHD for 45s. 60 body shots: 80% weapon damage for 45s. 30 leg shots: 150% reload speed for 45s.

Name: Bullet Hell
Desc: Never needs to be reloaded. For every 100 bullets that hit an enemy, replenish some ammo to you and your allies' reserves.

Name: Plague of the Outcasts
Desc: Hits apply debuff for 100% weapon damage over 10s stacking to 50. Stacks are transferred to a nearby enemy within 25M on death.

Name: Regicide
Desc: Headshot kills deals 400% weapon damage and applies bleed to enemies within 5 meters of the enemy killed.

Name: Liberty or Death
Desc: Gain a stack on each hit, up to 30. Headshots consume all stacks, repairing your shield for 3% per stack.

Name: Geri and Freki
Desc: Fire both barrels at once. Right shoulder hits add offensive primers, left shoulder hits add defensive primers. Hits from one shoulder will detonate all of the opposite shoulder's primers when present. When detonated, each offensive primer deals 75% weapon damage, while each defensive primer grants 2% bonus armor for 5 seconds. Primer effectiveness is doubled at 10 stacks.

Name: Agonizing Bite
Desc: Randomly marks an enemy. Hitting enemy consumes the mark, guaranteeing a critical hit with damage amplified by 20%.

Name: Binary Trigger
Desc: Gain a stack if both bullets hit the same enemy. At 7 stacks, hitting an enemy creates a 7M explosion for 900% weapon damage.

Name: Sandman
Desc: Melee attacks instantly kill non-elite enemies. Cooldown: 15 seconds

Name: Breathe Free
Desc: Gain 4 stacks/s moving, 8 sprinting, 40 max. Shots use a stack, increasing damage by 60%. Kills grant 20% movement speed for 10s.

Name: Incessant Chatter
Desc: Reloading increases ROF 20% for each enemy within 15M for the duration of that magazine. 5 stacks max. Kills refill 50% of your magazine.

Name: Perfect Breadbasket

Name: Perfectly Unhinged
Desc: Receive 22% weapon damage at the cost of 25% stability and 25% accuracy.

Name: Swift
Desc: Performing a cover to cover grants 20% weapon damage for 15s.
